about.name: Sydney
about.info_text: Sydney is the largest and most populous city in Australia, known for its stunning harbor, iconic landmarks, and vibrant culture. It offers a diverse range of experiences, from the world-famous Sydney Opera House and Sydney Harbour Bridge to beautiful beaches, lush national parks, and a thriving arts and dining scene. Sydney is a dynamic city that blends modernity with natural beauty, making it a top destination for travelers from around the globe.
about.facts_text:
Population: Approximately 5.4 million
State: New South Wales
Time Zone: Australian Eastern Standard Time (AEST, UTC+10:00)
Language: English
Currency: Australian Dollar (AUD)
about.climate_text: Sydney enjoys a temperate climate, with warm summers and mild winters. It's known for its blue skies and sunny days, making it a great year-round destination for outdoor activities.

attractions_card.title: Sydney Opera House
attractions_card.description: The Sydney Opera House is one of the most iconic performing arts venues globally, renowned for its distinctive architectural design and hosting world-class performances.

attractions_card.title: Sydney Harbour Bridge
attractions_card.description: The Sydney Harbour Bridge is a famous steel arch bridge that offers the opportunity to climb for breathtaking panoramic views of the city and harbor.

attractions_card.title: Bondi Beach
attractions_card.description: Bondi Beach is a world-famous stretch of golden sand known for its excellent surf, beautiful coastal walks, and vibrant beachside culture.

attractions_card.title: Royal Botanic Garden
attractions_card.description: The Royal Botanic Garden is a peaceful oasis in the heart of the city, featuring a diverse collection of plants, serene gardens, and stunning harbor views.

attractions_card.title: Taronga Zoo
attractions_card.description: Taronga Zoo is home to a wide range of native and exotic animals, offering an educational and enjoyable experience for visitors of all ages.

attractions_card.title: The Rocks
attractions_card.description: The Rocks is a historic neighborhood with cobbled streets, unique shops, lively markets, and a rich cultural heritage. It's an ideal place to explore Sydney's history.

attractions_card.title: Darling Harbour
attractions_card.description: Darling Harbour is a bustling waterfront precinct with an array of attractions, including museums, entertainment, dining, and stunning harbor views.

attractions_card.title: Blue Mountains
attractions_card.description: The Blue Mountains offer a stunning natural escape from the city, with towering eucalyptus trees, waterfalls, and opportunities for hiking and adventure.

food_card.title: Pavlova
food_card.description: Pavlova is a popular Australian dessert made with a crispy meringue shell, topped with whipped cream, and fresh fruits like kiwi, strawberries, and passionfruit.

food_card.title: Tim Tams
food_card.description: Tim Tams are a beloved Australian chocolate biscuit, featuring layers of chocolate cream sandwiched between two chocolate cookies and coated in chocolate.

food_card.title: Barramundi
food_card.description: Barramundi is a delicious Australian fish, often grilled or pan-fried and served with a variety of sauces, making it a popular seafood choice.

food_card.title: Vegemite
food_card.description: Vegemite is a savory spread that's an Aussie breakfast staple, best enjoyed on toast with butter or in sandwiches.

food_card.title: Flat White
food_card.description: The Flat White is a coffee beverage originating from Australia, featuring espresso and steamed milk, known for its smooth and creamy taste.

hotels_card.title: Park Hyatt Sydney
hotels_card.description: The Park Hyatt Sydney offers luxurious accommodations with stunning views of the Opera House and Harbour Bridge, as well as a waterfront restaurant.

hotels_card.title: Shangri-La Hotel Sydney
hotels_card.description: The Shangri-La Hotel in Sydney features elegant rooms with panoramic views, excellent dining options, and a rooftop pool.

hotels_card.title: Four Seasons Hotel Sydney
hotels_card.description: The Four Seasons Hotel provides stylish accommodations, a harborside location, and top-notch amenities, including a spa and dining.

hotels_card.title: QT Sydney
hotels_card.description: QT Sydney offers unique and quirky design, with rooms featuring bold artwork, and it's conveniently located near shopping and attractions.

hotels_card.title: InterContinental Sydney
hotels_card.description: The InterContinental in Sydney is a historic hotel with luxurious rooms, multiple dining options, and breathtaking harbor views.

transport_card.title: Sydney Trains
transport_card.description: Sydney Trains provide an extensive network for convenient urban transportation, connecting the city to its suburbs and landmarks.

transport_card.title: Sydney Buses
transport_card.description: Sydney Buses offer a comprehensive bus service for getting around the city, reaching various neighborhoods and attractions.

transport_card.title: Sydney Ferries
transport_card.description: Sydney Ferries provide scenic transportation across the harbor, offering passengers a unique way to enjoy the stunning waterfront views.

transport_card.title: Light Rail
transport_card.description: The Sydney Light Rail is a modern tram system, connecting the city center with areas like Darling Harbour and the University of New South Wales.

transport_card.title: Kingsford Smith International Airport
transport_card.description: Sydney's international airport, known as Kingsford Smith International Airport (SYD), is the main gateway for travelers arriving in the city.
